introduction: The Prophet says there might be allies in this hole.

effect: Additional summon 1 Level 0 monster. All our monsters’ base ATK becomes the average of their base ATK (round up).

introduction: [Persistent] The Prophet found a hole like a black hole.
effect: At End Phase: you may place any number of monsters from hand or field onto this card. During Set phase: you may summon up to two from this card (first counts as Normal Summon, second as Additional Summon). (Cards placed on this card are not on the field.)

introduction: [Persistent] A once-kind goblin, slain by kin, became a spirit.
effect: After use, during our turns treat this as a monster: Spirit type, ATK 4, DEF 4.

introduction: “All in—what’s to fear?” says the Prophet.
effect: Any number of our attack-capable monsters perform a joint attack with combined ATK. The joint attack does not trigger any opponent effects. Those monsters cannot attack again this turn.

introduction: Someone must pay for prosperity, says the Prophet.
effect: Destroy 1 of our monsters; draw 3 cards.
Destroy 1 of our monsters. Choose another of our monsters: it gains ATK +5 and Mana + (1 + the destroyed monster’s Mana).

responsive_effect: When the opponent declares an attack: pay 1 Mana to negate the attack and destroy the attacker; if destroyed, we gain Faith +3.

effect: (Once per turn) Remove 2 Mana from our field (not from this card) to destroy 1 opponent card; then this card gains +1 Mana.

responsive_effect: When we take **battle damage**: discard X cards; draw (X + 2) cards.
After we deal any damage: this turn all **effect damage** the opponent takes is ×2.
When we take **effect damage**: negate that damage and inflict the same amount to the opponent.

When the attacked opponent monster is not destroyed by battle: if our attacker’s ATK > that target’s original DEF, destroy it; then recalc **battle damage** using its original DEF (treated as **effect damage**), and gain its Mana.

When our monster is destroyed by an effect: its Mana is not absorbed; attach that Mana to this card and keep this card temporarily. At end of turn: [Direct Summon] that monster to our field, return its Mana and give +1 extra Mana; then destroy this card and attach it as Mana to that monster.

effect: If we control any monster, we may make two additional summons.

effect: Choose 1 monster on the field: it gains ATK +10 until end of turn.
